title: Monetise Substack Ecosystem Map
description: This document serves as a comprehensive map of all URLs, products, price points, freebies, and backend configurations active on the `https://www.monetisesubstack.com` domain.

items.name: Build to Profit Live Workshop
items.description: The flagship live workshop offering, teaching foundational monetization strategies.

items.name: The $10k Launch Lab
items.description: A higher-tier workshop focused on consistent 10k launches.

items.name: The Money Map
items.description: A complete strategy course covering ICP, offer, positioning, segmentation, messaging, and copy. Note: Currently, the root domain `/` is set in `src/app/page.tsx` to automatically redirect traffic to `/10k-launch-lab`.
items.callout: Sold as $300 Bump on Build to Profit

items.name: How to Hit 10k Workshop
items.description: A lower barrier-to-entry challenge or mini-workshop.

items.name: 100 Genius Launch Ideas
items.description: A digital product detailing successful launch ideas and frameworks.

sections.title: AI Software & Custom Tools (Freebies & Paid Add-ons)

apps.name: Show Don't Tell - Viral Thumbnail Generator
apps.description: A custom-coded AI agent connecting to Nano Banana (Gemini 2.5 Flash Image) to dynamically generate scroll-stopping brand thumbnails. Protected by a `TokenID` access model.

apps.name: Ana Ai Offer Flow
apps.description: An interactive AI tool designed to clarify and flow out product offerings.

apps.name: Ana Offer Genius
apps.description: An AI-powered builder that helps users craft high-converting offers.
apps.access: Initially internal/gated; sold as an Order Bump on various funnels (usually **$27 - $37** value).

apps.name: The Launch Stack
apps.description: A comprehensive launch project management tool or dashboard.
apps.access: Password Protected (Requires the master password `mellon_hwg`, defined in `.env.local`). Also sold as an Order Bump (usually **$67 - $69** value).

table.name: Hooks That Stop the Scroll
table.details: A vault of high-converting headline frameworks and opening loops designed to capture attention instantly.

table.name: The 60-Minute Launch Calendar
table.details: The exact day-by-day Notion templates used to manage 6-figure launches without burnout.

table.name: CUSTOM CODED: OfferGeniusâ„¢ AI Builder
table.details: A custom AI tool that automatically perfectly customizes an offer for a specific audience to eliminate checkout hesitation.

table.name: CUSTOM TRAINED: 'Lazy Launch' AI EMAIL WRITER
table.details: A custom-trained AI system pre-loaded with psychological email sequences designed to sell without sounding "salesy".

table.name: The Money Map Bundle
table.details: Bundles the entry-level live workshop with the comprehensive 'Money Map' strategy course normally valued at $497.

table.name: 1:1 Sales Coaching Session
table.details: A direct, high-touch 1:1 strategy and group coaching add-on to maximize the impact of the launch templates.

sections.title: Success & Thank You Pages (Fulfillment)
sections.description: These pages handle the post-purchase experience, dynamic rendering of purchased bumps, and direct access links.

items.name: General Build to Profit Success
items.redirect: Displays a 3-second countdown before automatically redirecting the user to a Google Doc containing instructions to join a private Substack community.
items.content: Confirms the order, details next steps (check email, calendar reminders), and lists bonuses (Resource Pack, Recordings).

items.name: 10k Launch Lab Success
items.content: Welcomes users to the 10k Launch Lab. Instructs them to check email and start Day 1 immediately.
dynamicRendering: If Upsell bought: Displays a block to book the 1:1 Coaching session via a `calendly.com/anacalin/30min` link.
If Bump 1 bought: Instructs the user to access "Hooks That Stop the Scroll" in their dashboard.
If Bump 2 bought: Instructs the user to view their Notion "60-Minute Launch Calendar" templates.

items.name: How to Hit 10k Success
items.content: Welcomes users to the "Hit Your First $10,000 Month" course. Gives a direct link to a YouTube video.
dynamicRendering: If Bump bought: Unlocks a high-visibility block for "Hooks That Stop the Scroll!" linking directly to a public Notion page (`anabubolea.notion.site/Hooks-That-Stop...`).

items.name: 100 Genius Ideas Success
items.content: Highlights an urgent "Do Not Close This Page" banner. Provides a direct local download link to the `100-Genius-Offers-Sell-2026.pdf` file.
dynamicRendering: If Bump 1 bought: Shows the OfferGenius block with a direct link to the `/ana-offer-genius` protected app.
If Bump 2 bought: Shows the Launch Stack block, revealing the password (`mellon_hwg`) required to access `/launch-stack` and links directly to it.

items.name: Show Don't Tell Success
items.content: A secure page that extracts the newly created programmatic `token_id` from the Stripe redirect URL (e.g. `SDT-XXXXXXXXXXXX`) and displays it in large text.
items.features: Provides a one-click "Copy to Clipboard" button and directs the user to immediately go to `/show-dont-tell` to login with their token.

sections.title: Backend Infrastructure Overview (API Ecosystem)
sections.description: These APIs run silently in the background routing traffic and managing state:

apis.description: Listens for successful Stripe `checkout.session.completed` events to fulfill leads, unlock Token IDs, setup credits, and log amounts paid across all tables.
Creates Stripe checkout sessions for the Build to Profit funnel.
Creates Stripe checkout sessions for the Thumbnail Generator credit packages.
Validates Token IDs and returns credit usage.
Manages credit deduction and invokes Google's Gemini SDK for thumbnail building.
Routes `launch-lab`, `hit10k`, and `genius-ideas` native Stripe Elements form transactions.

tables.name: leads_bootcamp_brands
tables.description: Stores data for the Build to profit workshop.

tables.name: launch_lab_leads
tables.description: Stores data and order bumps for the 10k Launch Lab.

tables.name: hit10k_leads
tables.description: Stores data for the How to Hit 10k Challenge.

tables.name: genius_ideas_leads
tables.description: Stores data for the 100 Genius Ideas funnel.

tables.name: show_dont_tell_users
tables.description: Manages tokens, expiration dates, and credits for the Thumbnail Generator.

tables.name: ana_ai_leads
tables.description: Stores leads and usage data for the free Ana AI Offer Flow tool.

items.name: Facebook (Meta) Pixel
items.description: Tracks page views and triggers 'Lead' or 'Purchase' events across all active funnels.

items.name: Rewardful Affiliate Tracking
items.description: Tracks affiliate referrals and confirms conversions on the `/success` page.

items.name: UseProof
items.description: Provides social proof popups across the site (dynamically injected via `cdn.useproof.com`).

sections.title: Environment Variables & Core Services
sections.description: Every production deployment relies on the following backend services and environment variables (defined in `.env.local`):

vars.description: Server-side admin key for backend webhooks.
Mounts Stripe Elements on frontend checkouts.
Server-side key for creating PaymentIntents and Sessions.
Validates webhook authenticity to fulfill products safely.
Invokes the `gemini-2.5-flash` environment for the "Show Don't Tell" thumbnail generator.
Used for redirect URLs, webhooks, and SEO metadata.
The master password protecting the `/launch-stack` dashboard (Defaults to `mellon_hwg`).
